entry.title: RUB Code and Corpus Repositories Uploaded

link.title: RUB Code and Corpus Repositories Uploaded

entry.content:
The RUB Corpus and Code has now been updated to host the corpus and code files.

Please find them at https://pjbraga.github.io/rub_corpus_and_code/corpus and https://pjbraga.github.io/rub_corpus_and_code/code.

For any questions please contact Peter Braga at pjbraga_rubcc@gmail.com.
entry.summary: The RUB Corpus and Code has now been updated to host the corpus and code files.

entry.title: RUB Corpus and Code Website Online

link.title: RUB Corpus and Code Website Online

entry.content:
The RUB (Russia, Ukraine, Belarus) corpus and code website is now online at https://pjbraga.github.io/rub_corpus_and_code/.

The site is still under construction. Alterations to site structure and page compositions are likely.

Any significant changes will be listed in the news page.
entry.summary: The RUB (Russia, Ukraine, Belarus) corpus and code website is now online at https://pjbraga.github.io/rub_corpus_and_code/.
